title: Founder Product Partner
description: I act as your technical co-founder for a fraction of the cost. I handle everything product-related: from roadmap planning and architecture to shipping and iterating based on user feedback.
targetAudience: Founders post-funding or revenue who need a senior lead to take ownership.

title: Launch-Ready Mobile MVP
description: Go from idea to App Store in 4-8 weeks. I build a high-quality, cross-platform mobile app that is ready for real users and scalable enough for your Series A.
targetAudience: Early-stage founders validating a mobile-first idea.

title: SaaS Platform V1
description: A complete web product foundation. Not just a landing page, but a fully functional SaaS application with payments, user management, and your core unique features.
targetAudience: B2B/B2C startups needing a robust web platform to acquire customers.

title: AI Feature Integration
description: Add intelligent features to your existing product without a rewrite. I slot in specific AI capabilities that solve real user problems and increase retention.
targetAudience: Product teams with an existing app wanting to add AI capabilities.
